items.content_html: A simple, lightweight website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that lets users take turns practicing with flashcards. Choose from preset subjects or create your own custom sets! Perfect for quick study sessions, group practice, or building your own learning topics.
items.title: Mithula-cbw/LearningCards: A simple, lightweight website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that lets users take turns practicing with flashcards. Choose from preset subjects or create your own custom sets! Perfect for quick study sessions, group practice, or building your own learning topics.

items.content_html: The Username Generator project aims to build a lightweight, engaging, and intelligent iOS mobile application and companion website that uses a Large Language Model (LLM) to generate creative, unique, and memorable usernames for users—particularly gamers, content creators, and social media enthusiasts.
items.title: TVW96/Username-Generator: The Username Generator project aims to build a lightweight, engaging, and intelligent iOS mobile application and companion website that uses a Large Language Model (LLM) to generate creative, unique, and memorable usernames for users—particularly gamers, content creators, and social media enthusiasts.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
